lead_paragraph: After 15 years of failing to win an Ashes test series in England, Cricket Australia have decided to give players more experience with the Dukes cricket ball by using it in their domestic first class competition from next year.

headline.print_headline: Australia to Switch to Dukes Ball to Prepare for Ashes
headline.main: Australia to Switch to Dukes Ball to Prepare for Ashes

snippet: After 15 years of failing to win an Ashes test series in England, Cricket Australia have decided to give players more experience with the Dukes cricket ball by using it in their domestic first class competition from next year....
